task.summary: Endless Loader working after removing items from recycler. Sample App Updated
* Adapter based OnItemClickListener and AlternateVIew Renaming
ImagePicker onClick Image Opens fullscreen Activity, restructuring
Basic Adapter Method moved to Interface.
Version updates and Touch listener experiments

MESSAGE.value: Endless Loader working after removing items from recycler. Sample App Updated
* Adapter based OnItemClickListener and AlternateVIew Renaming
ImagePicker onClick Image Opens fullscreen Activity, restructuring
Basic Adapter Method moved to Interface.
Version updates and Touch listener experiments
